features: NO INSTALLATION: The portable washer machine makes it easy to start using it right out of the box. The best portable washer does not require any special parts or plumbing
IDEAL FOR SMALL LOADS: A portable washer is perfect for quick loads of essentials, such as underwear, socks, towels, T-shirts and tank tops
ROTARY CONTROLS: The portable washer machine features rotary controls for wash timer, a quiet motor, and a water-efficient design
EASY TO USE: The portable washer features a convenient top loading system. Simply insert detergent and water into the portable washer dryer combo. A power cord and drain hose are included

COMPACT & HIGH POWER: The portable clothes washer has a high-powered 180-watt motor, wash load capacity of 4.5 lbs, water tank capacity of 19 liters. Watch your clothes get clean with a translucent tub container window

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purchase ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this machine and we use it 3 or 4 times a week. It’s not for heavy laundry but I do wash my 10 year olds uniform pants and shirts. We don’t over fill it. 2 or 3 pair of pants max or 4 shirts washed separately. Especially if heavily soiled. If you put more you have to rewash the loads more. Be careful with it. This is my second time purchasing. Somehow the first one got a split in the hose and unfortunately if you don’t purchase the warranty you’re out of luck. I could never get support on the phone and we couldn’t figure out how to replace the hose. But I still rate it a 5. The hose damage was likely one of my kids fault. They kept pushing the door into the hose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy construction, leaks everywhere!
reviews.reviewText: It's small, it 'works' and it's extremely easy to set up. Unfortunately, it also leaks like crazy. The machine I received wasn't damaged, but the shoddy construction work and ill-fitting lid meant there was plenty of space for water to escape. Water sloshed out between the lid and the side, and condensation on the inner side of the lid rolled down into the gap in the joint then outside the machine. While only half full, the spinning action still managed to shoot water out of the properly stored drain hose. After running it for about 5 minutes at only half capacity my countertop was soaked and I had to shut it off.Definitely spend your money on a better product! This thing is getting returned as soon as it dries off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this product. It washes my clothes quickly and I certainly don’t have to wash my clothes at the laundromat anymore. Now I just throw my dirty clothes everyday in there when I take them off and when it starts getting full after a few days I just fill it up with water and soap and turn it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great for what it is
reviews.reviewText: First, let's talk about what this is not - it's not a replacement for a full size washer. It is not suitable for every day use.However, it would be great for a camper. You can wash 4 lbs of clothes at a time. Surprisingly it agitates well.We bought this because our washer broke and the warranty work became a long drawn out process. It performed great - washing socks, underwear, shorts, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use & compact plus washes very well
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I thinks it’s great like I said in the little video. It’s perfect for my tiny apartment and I don’t need wait in line to wash my clothes. It will probably wash a sheet from my queen size bed but not the comforter but that’s ok. It is perfect for washing delicate silks and bras so I’m very happy with it. The instructions made me laugh and worry a bit but found so videos online how to operate it and now it’s a snap;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Make sure all attachments are there.
reviews.reviewText: Overall I like it but it didn't come with a spin basket. How do you supposed to ring out the extra water. That's hard for me because I have no hand grip. This a long make me wish that I shouldn't have bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it if you live in a dorm or small apartment. Or if you just need one.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is really portable and light enough, I just had surgery and I can lift it. As for usefulness it’s a 10/10 and it really works.Remember the1. hose it comes with it inside is what you use to put water in it or you can do it manually.2. The hose outside needs to be hanged up when you deposit or put water in it or else it will evacuate the container while you put water in it.3. Don’t over fill the container with water it will spill and break.4. Don’t over fill it with heavy clothes because the pulsator will break and have a hard time spinning, it is after all for light weight type of clothes or linens.5. Remember to clean it after and put it away neatly to make the life of it last.Now enjoy your new portable washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I hoped for not worth it
reviews.reviewText: First one came cracked so I sent it back and a new one came within a week. Tried it as soon as it came. It was a pain in the behind to use cause you have to manually fill it with water. The detachable hose was useless. Instructions say to choose between regular or gentle but couldn't find anything that lets you choose. To rinse you have to run the whole process again without soap. If you happen to put a little too much soap you will have to run it a third time to get it rinsed out well. There is no spin cycle so you have to ring out each item by hand. It would've been just as easy to hand wash my items in a bucket. If you expect this to do what a regular washer does then don't buy it. The only difference between using this and hand washing is the machine will do the washing otherwise everything else is like handwashing. Manual also says to ground the green wire but there was no green wire. By now I think you have a clear idea of what I think of this machine.

Al momento puedo decir que es bastante funcional, si consideras que solo puedes lavar pocas prendas y que debes hacer los cambios de agua para el enjuague tú solo y obviamente exprimir las prendas. Es ideal si vives solo en un cuarto pequeño o viajas mucho.

Es muy práctica y lava la ropa muy rápido (OJO, como la descripción lo dice, NO SECA NI EXPRIME), pero es un poco frágil, la calidad no es la mejor y por eso mismo no es muy resistente, hay que tratarla con mucho cuidado. Los 2 kilos de capacidad debe referir a ropa mojada, porque realmente soporta una carga muy pequeña (8 o 9 playeras,o 3 o 4 pantalones, por ejemplo). El precio comparado con otras lavadoras de este estilo es muy conveniente y accesible.
